Yay! Thanks my career mode savefile misses the stargazer

Definitely.

Tell you what, I'll create the torpedo and the propulsion, but you have to add in the compatibility for the weapons mod.

So right now, I am definitely doing the Doomsday Machine, the Legacy Pod, and a Torpedo.

That's great, thanks.
How about the Delta Flyer or a TNG shuttle. Or maybe a Battlestar Viper?

Starvision I've got a question I've been dying to ask a modder how hard is it to mod I don't think the frame or shape of the mod is hard but the cfg and the Iva and the texture sounds hard and if its quite easy then can you please give me the link to what you use cause I'm scared look cause I usually end up with a virus and also I'm not very experience on computers so I won't be able to understand modding too much.

Starvision I've got a question I've been dying to ask a modder how hard is it to mod I don't think the frame or shape of the mod is hard but the cfg and the Iva and the texture sounds hard and if its quite easy then can you please give me the link to what you use cause I'm scared look cause I usually end up with a virus and also I'm not very experience on computers so I won't be able to understand modding too much.

You've got it all backwards. The model and the texture are the only hard parts really, and I guess Unity if you aren't familiar with it. Anyways, If you want to get into modding, you probably want to look at this thread. As far as what I use, that would be Blender and Paint.net. You shouldn't have any problem finding those through Google. Just take a look through the thread I linked for tutorials. There should be some semi-recent ones there.

I've almost finished everything now, I just need to fix the Stargazer, which will probably involve redoing the whole ship, but that's fine, there's nothing too complex about it anyways, it's even easier than the original Enterprise.

K thanks cause i maybe wanting to make mods but I'm not sure it seems awfully difficult for my little brain. Like I said thx I will see in the future If I want try modding. I'm really exited to see how everything comes out at the end!
Please Re-do and update the Enterprise D before you wrap everything up. that was a awesome ship. but voyager is cooler

Please Re-do and update the Enterprise D before you wrap everything up. that was a awesome ship. but voyager is cooler

I don't see that happening, considering how complex it is. I just don't really feel like investing a bunch time in another big ship right now. I'll probably model it at some point, but not anytime soon.

In regards to the mod itself, everything is now modeled, I just need to texture the stargazer and spruce up the IVA a bit, as well as finish the original command pod. Here's what the ship looks like now:
Is it going to be the same size or to scale but I don't know if the old one was to scale.

Is it going to be the same size or to scale but I don't know if the old one was to scale.

It will be to scale with kerbin, which I believe is 1/6. Anyways, it will be roughly the same size as the Enterprise.
Lol I thought when you said the scale of Kerbin I thought it was going to be the size of the planet but I understand. The real earth scale it enterprise is bigger O_o wow
I'd like to see a proper DeLorean.

I'd like to see a proper DeLorean.

The Stargazer is done. I just need to get it through Unity.

I know someone suggested it but can we get a Delta flyer for Voyager?
there is going to be a doomsday machine o.0 EPIC!. will it have the super weapon and fire animation inside it?

looks very nice:cool: ohh I saw your flag mod, how does it work, can I use a texture and slap it to replace the one there, that mod could help me out with decals on stuff

It's just a simple mesh with a texture. It makes use of the FlagDecal module, which replaces a specified texture with the current mission flag. It's really easy to create them yourself.

I know someone suggested it but can we get a Delta flyer for Voyager?

I seem to remember that too, but I'm not really going to be making anything else. The Stargazer and the Legacy command pod will be my last projects.

there is going to be a doomsday machine o.0 EPIC!. will it have the super weapon and fire animation inside it?

It's really nothing special. It's just a cone with some deformities and a glowing bit inside.

A little progress report, the Stargazer is now in-game, and the external should be 100% complete tonight. Tomorrow I'll start on the internal.
